content: need a fast and cozy winter project this chunky crochet beanie pattern is the perfect mix of style warmth and simplicity made with super bulky yarn this quick crochet winter hat is worked from the top down and comes together in just a few rounds making it ideal for last-minute gifts or a relaxing weekend project the ribbed brim is created with simple post stitches adding both stretch and structure for a comfortable fit whether you re making the child or adult size you ll love how quickly this hat works up and how warm it feels on chilly days
